vocabInfos.lsjDefs:
ἐγκομβ-όομαι,
middle, (κόμβος) bind a thing on oneself, wear it constantly, [NT+4th c.BC+]
__II passive, ={δέομαι},{ἐνειλοῦμαι} [Refs 5th c.BC+]
vocabInfos.mediumDef:
to clothe (oneself) with, put on
primarily to put on a garment which is to be tied; in NT to put on, clothe one's self with; metaphorically 1Pet. 5:5*
